laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Amniocentesis and DNA analysis for PAX6 mutation
laboratory_examinations.findings: DNA from the fetus demonstrated the same banding pattern as the affected father and firstborn infant, indicating the presence of the mutated PAX6 allele.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: PCR-based Ava1 restriction analysis and SSCP
laboratory_examinations.findings: Only one band in the lane containing DNA from the mother. DNA from the father, son, and the amniocentesis sample presented an additional band, confirming the presence of the aniridia mutation.
